      • complexBuilding

        public ReactionBuilder.ComplexBuildingReactionStep complexBuilding()
        Description copied from interface: ReactionBuilder.KineticStep
        Complex building reactions classically require two substrates that react to build one complex. The reaction rate is described by a association rate (k1 or forwards rate) and a dissociation rate (k-1 or backwards rate).
        Specified by:
        complexBuilding in interface ReactionBuilder.KineticStep
        Returns:
        complex building reaction step
